name: github-code-review
description: AI-powered comprehensive GitHub code review using specialized agents for security, performance, architecture, and style.
author: Claude Code Flow (ported via skill-porter)

commands.name: gh-review
commands.description: Perform an AI-powered code review on a GitHub PR.
commands.prompt: You are a code review expert. Perform a comprehensive review of the following GitHub PR, focusing on security, performance, architecture, and style: PR #{{pr_number}}
